name: Investment Overdrive
title: Top Investor in Nonfinancial Assets
description: In 2016, Timor-Leste led the world with a net investment in nonfinancial assets at 40.29% of its GDP, showcasing a strong commitment to infrastructure and development.

name: Expense Extravaganza
title: Highest Other Expense Proportion
description: In 2022, 42.80% of Timor-Leste's expenses were categorized as 'other,' indicating a diverse allocation of resources beyond traditional categories.

name: Resource Reliance
title: High Natural Resource Depletion
description: By 2021, Timor-Leste experienced significant natural resource depletion, with energy and natural resources accounting for 57.20% and 57.30% of GNI, respectively.

name: Gas Giant
title: Leading Natural Gas Rent Contributor
description: In 2021, natural gas rents constituted 29.38% of Timor-Leste's GDP, highlighting its heavy reliance on this sector for economic stability.

name: Concerning Beliefs
title: High Acceptance of Domestic Violence
description: A concerning 62.8% of women in Timor-Leste believed in 2016 that a husband is justified in beating his wife for neglecting children, reflecting deep-rooted societal issues.

name: Business Transparency Blues
title: Opaque Business Environment
description: In 2024, Timor-Leste scored 3.2 in the Quality of Public Services and Transparency of Information for Business Location, indicating challenges in business transparency.

name: Dispute Dilemma
title: Inefficient Dispute Resolution
description: With an overall score of 36.47 in 2024, Timor-Leste faces significant hurdles in resolving business disputes efficiently.

name: Financial Fog
title: Complex Financial Services
description: In 2024, the country's financial services scored 24.82, reflecting regulatory and accessibility challenges in the financial sector.

name: Competitive Conundrum
title: Stifled Market Competition
description: Timor-Leste's market competition score of 16.69 in 2024 highlights regulatory and service-related barriers to competition.

name: Regulatory Riddle
title: Challenging Regulatory Framework
description: The regulatory framework scored 46.21 in 2024, indicating complexities in the country's regulatory environment.

name: Export Exodus
title: Plummeting Exports
description: In 2023, exports of goods and services declined by 59.99%, posing a significant challenge to the economy.

name: Industrial Inertia
title: Declining Industrial Growth
description: The industry sector, including construction, shrank by 56.97% in 2023, reflecting economic stagnation.

name: Income Implosion
title: Falling National Income
description: Adjusted net national income fell by 65.66% in 2021, indicating economic distress.

name: Savings Shortfall
title: Negative Savings Rate
description: In 2021, adjusted net savings, including particulate emission damage, were at -81.62% of GNI, highlighting financial vulnerabilities.

name: Deflation Dilemma
title: Deflationary Pressures
description: The GDP deflator indicated a -20.83% deflation in 2023, suggesting economic contraction.
